setModalData] = useState(null); // ✅ Products categorized into Featured, Arrivals, and On Sale const products = { featured: [ { id: 1, image: "/images/product/1.jpg", name: "Necklace", price: "/images/product/36.jpg", name: "Diamonds", price: "₹94,015", rating: 4.5 }, ], }; const openModal = (product) => setModalData(product); const closeModal = () => setModalData(null); return (
